name: Enhance That Jar of Spaghetti Sauce
author: J.Mohojo
summary: I never have enough sauce from just a jar alone. I also like the taste of fresh ingredients. I like to combine both in this recipe! The red wine makes all the difference. Serve on favorite noodles with mozzarella cheese and mushrooms on top.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped red bell pepper
½ cup chopped green bell pepper
directions: Melt butter with olive oil in a small skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir mushrooms in butter mixture until softened, 2 to 3 minutes
Add 1/4 cup red wine; bring to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook until the mushrooms are very dark and shrunken in size, about 20 minutes
Heat a large pot over medium heat

Cook and stir ground beef, yellow onion, diced tomatoes, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, and garlic together until the beef is completely browned, about 10 minutes; season with oregano, basil, and rosemary
Stir 3/4 cup red wine and tomato paste into the beef mixture
Pour spaghetti sauce into the pot; stir
Return mixture to a simmer and continue cooking until the flavors blend, 10 to 30 minutes
